title: Ranked 5s
body:
Looking for players of any rank to play ranked 5s

Add me ingame*

replies.body: You have to be within 1 league now because they removed ranked 5s since there is dynamic, even if you have 5 players a gold player and a diamond player can not play together in the new queue.

> [{quoted}](name=Blatzcrink,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=kxbs806y,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-27T08:48:53.482+0000)
>
> You have to be within 1 league now because they removed ranked 5s since there is dynamic, even if you have 5 players a gold player and a diamond player can not play together in the new queue.

Stupidest idea ever... I'm going to miss ranked 5's so much.
Yeah I can't play with my friends now.

> [{quoted}](name=Blatzcrink,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=kxbs806y,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-28T04:22:27.030+0000)
>
> Yeah I can't play with my friends now.

Same... I have friends ranging from bronze - challenger who now can't play together in ranked 5's. Stupidest idea ever IMO.............................
